Package com.notonthehighstreet.promotion

Interface PromotionRule

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPromotionRule, BulkDiscountRule, BuyAndGetFreeRule, UnitPriceReductionRule
    public interface PromotionRule
    PromotionRule is an interface that all promotion rules should implement it.
